channel.title: Aarch64.com - Blog

item.title: AArch64's budgeting system for fair resource usage
item.description: To guarantee fair resource utilization by our tenants, we implemented a budgeting system on AArch64. Previously, our platform had no limit on the number of resources a project could use when creating virtual machines (VMs) during the beta period
